definition: to pay no attention to a familiar sight/to ignore

sentences.english: We cannot close our eyes to evildoers and evil deeds.
sentences.chinese: 我們對壞人壞事決不能熟視無睹。

sentences.english: We can't turn a blind eye to anti-social behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能對不良社會行爲熟視無睹。

sentences.english: All ears and eyes, a Zambezi River hippo ignores a hitchhiker.
sentences.chinese: 一頭贊比西河河馬對搭便車的小鳥熟視無睹。

sentences.english: I turned out to get a scan.
sentences.chinese: 我熟視無睹地拿餘光一掃而過。

sentences.english: Talk about them often together in a non-intimidating way.
sentences.chinese: 經常一起說說這些，不要熟視無睹。
